channel.title: Cloudflare R2 Incidents
channel.description: RSS feed of Cloudflare incidents related to R2

item.title: R2 Availability drop for clients in India
item.description: R2 customers may have seen an elevated error rates between 16:25 - 16:50 UTC.

item.title: Elevated Latency For Some R2 Customers In ENAM
item.description: Between 15:30-17:30 UTC some customers in the Eastern North America Region experienced elevated latency when accessing their R2 buckets. This has been resolved.

item.title: Issues with Stream Live, Stream VOD, Durable Objects, R2 and Workers Builds
High R2 request latency in ENAM region
